Option(name='win_size', help='set the window size', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_INT', default="['.i64=2048']", choices=[])

Option(name='win_func', help='set window function', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_INT', default="['.i64 = WFUNC_HANNING']", choices=[Choice(name='rect', help='Rectangular', value="['.i64=WFUNC_RECT']"), Choice(name='bartlett', help='Bartlett', value="['.i64=WFUNC_BARTLETT']"), Choice(name='hann', help='Hann', value="['.i64=WFUNC_HANNING']"), Choice(name='hanning', help='Hanning', value="['.i64=WFUNC_HANNING']"), Choice(name='hamming', help='Hamming', value="['.i64=WFUNC_HAMMING']"), Choice(name='blackman', help='Blackman', value="['.i64=WFUNC_BLACKMAN']"), Choice(name='welch', help='Welch', value="['.i64=WFUNC_WELCH']"), Choice(name='flattop', help='Flat-top', value="['.i64=WFUNC_FLATTOP']"), Choice(name='bharris', help='Blackman-Harris', value="['.i64=WFUNC_BHARRIS']"), Choice(name='bnuttall', help='Blackman-Nuttall', value="['.i64=WFUNC_BNUTTALL']"), Choice(name='bhann', help='Bartlett-Hann', value="['.i64=WFUNC_BHANN']"), Choice(name='sine', help='Sine', value="['.i64=WFUNC_SINE']"), Choice(name='nuttall', help='Nuttall', value="['.i64=WFUNC_NUTTALL']"), Choice(name='lanczos', help='Lanczos', value="['.i64=WFUNC_LANCZOS']"), Choice(name='gauss', help='Gauss', value="['.i64=WFUNC_GAUSS']"), Choice(name='tukey', help='Tukey', value="['.i64=WFUNC_TUKEY']"), Choice(name='dolph', help='Dolph-Chebyshev', value="['.i64=WFUNC_DOLPH']"), Choice(name='cauchy', help='Cauchy', value="['.i64=WFUNC_CAUCHY']"), Choice(name='parzen', help='Parzen', value="['.i64=WFUNC_PARZEN']"), Choice(name='poisson', help='Poisson', value="['.i64=WFUNC_POISSON']"), Choice(name='bohman', help='Bohman', value="['.i64=WFUNC_BOHMAN']"), Choice(name='kaiser', help='Kaiser', value="['.i64=WFUNC_KAISER']")])
Option(name='overlap', help='set window overlap', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_FLOAT', default="['.dbl=0.5']", choices=[])

Option(name='measure', help='select the parameters which are measured', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_FLAGS', default="['.i64=(2147483647 *2U +1U)']", choices=[Choice(name='none', help='', value="['.i64=0']"), Choice(name='all', help='', value="['.i64=(2147483647 *2U +1U)']"), Choice(name='mean', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 0)']"), Choice(name='variance', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 1)']"), Choice(name='centroid', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 2)']"), Choice(name='spread', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 3)']"), Choice(name='skewness', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 4)']"), Choice(name='kurtosis', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 5)']"), Choice(name='entropy', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 6)']"), Choice(name='flatness', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 7)']"), Choice(name='crest', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 8)']"), Choice(name='flux', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 9)']"), Choice(name='slope', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 10)']"), Choice(name='decrease', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 11)']"), Choice(name='rolloff', help='', value="['.i64=(1 << 12)']")])
